articles.content: After a wild regular season full of Atlantic Division dominance, up-and-down acts from teams like the Oilers, and offensive resurgence across the board, weve reached the pinnacle of the NHL calendar:… [+6845 chars]

articles.title: Eagles earn high grades from national draft analysts - PhillyVoice.com
articles.description: There are some who believe you should not grade a draft until three years have passed. Those people suck. Here's what some of the outsiders are saying about the Birds' draft haul.
articles.content:
There are some who believe you should not grade a draft until three years have passed. Those people suck. In case you missed our Eagles draft grades, you can find them here.

articles.author: Ben Morse, CNN
articles.title: Giannis Antetokounmpo scores amazing self alley-oop, bags triple-double as Bucks cruise over Celtics in Game 1 - CNN
articles.description: Facing the NBA's No. 1 defense in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference semifinals, Giannis Antetokounmpo was still able to blow people's minds with a crazy highlight play.
